mapper.select: SELECT ROLE_CODE, ROLE_NM, ROLE_PTTRN, ROLE_DC, ROLE_TY, ROLE_SORT, ROLE_CREAT_DE FROM COMTNROLEINFO WHERE ROLE_CODE = #{roleCode}

SELECT ROLE_CODE, ROLE_NM, ROLE_PTTRN, ROLE_DC, (SELECT CODE_NM FROM COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE WHERE CODE_ID = 'COM029' AND CODE = ROLE_TY) AS ROLE_TY, ROLE_SORT, ROLE_CREAT_DE FROM COMTNROLEINFO WHERE 1=1 AND ROLE_NM LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{searchKeyword}, '%')
ORDER BY ROLE_CREAT_DE DESC LIMIT #{recordCountPerPage} OFFSET #{firstIndex}
